last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: Liz Bonnin explores relationships in the animal kingdom and asks whether animals love. Here, she uncovers the weird and wonderful ways that different species attract a mate.

name: Animals in Love
overview: Liz Bonnin sets out to explore how animals meet, mate and in some cases form lifelong relationships, shining a light on the extraordinary emotions that it seems animals are capable of.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Liz Bonnin explores relationships in the animal kingdom and asks whether animals love. She meets two elephants with a lifelong friendship and a remarkable pair of penguins.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Liz Bonnin explores relationships in the animal kingdom and asks whether animals love. Here, she uncovers the weird and wonderful ways that different species attract a mate.
